api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: Your secret Pinecone API key used to authenticate requests.

region.title: Region
region.description: The Pinecone region where your index is hosted (e.g., 'us-east-1').

index_name.title: Index Name
index_name.description: The name of the Pinecone index where vectors will be written.

model.title: Model
model.description: The embedding model used to convert text into vector representations.

namespace.title: Namespace
namespace.description: The namespace within the index for logical separation of data.
